text.name: Hugo
text.introSection: . I'm a full stack developer with professional experience building end-to-end web applications. I specialize in Node.js backends and modern frontend frameworks like React, Next.js, and Angular.
text.learningSection: I consider myself highly resolutive and enjoy tackling complex problems with creative solutions. I work across the entire stack, from database design to user interfaces, always finding efficient ways to deliver results.
text.finalSection: If you're looking for someone who can build complete applications from start to finish, I'd love to work with you and help take your project to the next level.
